item.title: 消息人士称迪士尼将在全球裁员数百人
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周一透露，华特迪士尼将在全球范围内裁员数百人，裁员范围包括电影和电视市场营销、宣传、选角和开发等团队。【原文：Walt Disney is laying off several hundred employees globally in teams including marketing for film and television, publicity, and casting and development, a source familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 古尔斯比称，美联储在经历颠簸期后可能走上降息轨道
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周一表示，他仍然认为，在关税政策带来的不确定性 "空气中的污垢 "消除后，美国央行将能够降低短期借贷成本。【原文：Chicago Federal Reserve Bank President Austan Goolsbee said on Monday he continues to think the U.S. central bank will be able to lower short-term borrowing costs after the "dirt in the air" of uncertainty from tariff policies gets cleared up.】

item.title: 解说员：特朗普征收钢铝关税的现实情况
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划从周三起将进口钢铁和铝的关税提高一倍，达到 50%，从而加大对全球钢铁生产商的压力，并深化其贸易战。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump plans to double tariffs on steel and aluminium imports to 50% from Wednesday, stepping up pressure on global steel producers and deepening his trade war.】

item.title: 美国要求为Keysight收购思博伦进行资产剥离
item.description: 美国政府周一表示，在允许 Keysight Technologies 完成对思博伦通信公司（Spirent Communications）的全现金收购之前，将要求其进行资产剥离。【原文：The U.S. government on Monday said it will require asset divestitures before allowing Keysight Technologies to complete its all-cash purchase of Spirent Communications .】

item.title: 特朗普政府提议取消拜登时代对阿拉斯加石油钻探的限制
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府周一提议取消拜登时代对阿拉斯加地区石油和天然气钻探的限制，该地区是美国最大的未受干扰的公共土地。【原文：The administration of U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday proposed rolling back Biden-era limits on oil and gas drilling in an Alaska area that is the nation's largest tract of undisturbed public land.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，马斯克的 xAI 在 3 亿美元的股票出售中寻求 1 130 亿美元的估值
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周一援引知情人士的话报道称，埃隆-马斯克的 xAI 公司正在寻求以价值 3 亿美元的股票出售获得 1 130 亿美元的估值。【原文：Elon Musk's xAI is seeking a valuation of $113 billion in a share sale worth $300 million, the Financial Times reported on Monday, citing people close to the situation.】

item.title: 航空公司和飞机制造商反对打击信用卡收费，因为这可能危及免费航班服务
item.description: 各大航空公司周一表示，他们反对一项旨在推动降低威士（Visa）和万事达（Mastercard）交易手续费的新立法，称该法案可能迫使他们停止提供奖励信用卡，即消费者通过交易获得飞行常客里程的信用卡。【原文：Major airlines said Monday they oppose a new effort to advance legislation that would reduce fees charged by Visa and Mastercard on transactions, saying the bill could force them to stop offering rewards credit cards that give consumers frequent flyer miles for making transactions.】

item.title: 森林暴风雪 "与 "花式熊"--网络公司希望消除黑客的怪异绰号
item.description: 微软、CrowdStrike、Palo Alto 和 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌周一表示，它们将为国家支持的黑客组织和网络犯罪分子创建一个公共词汇表，以缓解人们对这些组织的非官方绰号的混淆。【原文：Microsoft, CrowdStrike, Palo Alto and Alphabet's Google on Monday said they would create a public glossary of state-sponsored hacking groups and cybercriminals, in a bid to ease confusion over the menagerie of unofficial nicknames for them.】

item.title: Dye & Durham 不顾前任首席执行官的要求，通过新的人选调整了 C-suite 团队
item.description: Dye & Durham 公司周一宣布了领导层的重大转变，任命了新的首席执行官和新的首席财务官，没有理会身为大投资者的前任首席执行官提出的另起炉灶的要求。【原文：Dye & Durham on Monday announced a dramatic shift in leadership when it named a new chief executive and a new chief financial officer, ignoring demands from a former chief who is also a large investor to pursue a different course.】

item.title: 联合健康首席执行官表示，计划重新赢得股东信任
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）新任首席执行官史蒂夫-赫姆斯利（Steve Hemsley）周一为公司近期盈利表现不佳道歉，并誓言将遏制保险业务成本上升，优化医疗服务质量。【原文：UnitedHealth Group's new CEO Steve Hemsley on Monday apologized for the company's recent earnings underperformance, and vowed it will curb rising costs in its insurance business and optimize quality in its health services moving forward.】

item.title: 美联储可以耐心等待，并在需要时随时做出反应：洛根
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）周一表示，随着劳动力市场趋于稳定、通胀略高于目标以及前景不明朗，美联储正在密切关注各种数据，以判断可能需要采取何种应对措施。【原文：With the labor market stable, inflation running somewhat above target, and the outlook uncertain, the Federal Reserve is keeping a watchful eye on a broad range of data to judge what response might be needed, Dallas Federal Reserve Bank President Lorie Logan said on Monday,.】

item.title: 苹果挑战 "不合理 "的欧盟向竞争对手开放的命令
item.description: 欧盟要求苹果公司向 Meta 和 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌等竞争对手开放其封闭的生态系统，苹果公司对此提出了法律挑战，称欧盟的要求不合理，阻碍了创新。【原文：Apple has submitted a legal challenge to an EU order to open up its closed ecosystem to rivals such as Meta and Alphabet's Google, saying the demands are unreasonable and hamper innovation.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，丰田工业将接受丰田集团 420 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周一报道，丰田工业预计最早将于周二接受全球最大汽车制造商丰田汽车公司及其他集团公司提出的价值 420 亿美元的收购要约。【原文：Toyota Industries is expected to accept the $42 billion takeover bid by the world's biggest automaker Toyota Motor Corp and other group companies as early as Tuesday, the Nikkei newspaper reported on Monday.】

item.title: 美国 4 月建筑支出因单户住宅项目疲软而下降
item.description: 受借贷成本上升和未售出房屋供应量增加导致独户住宅项目支出下降的影响，4 月份美国建筑支出意外下降。【原文：U.S. construction spending unexpectedly fell in April, weighed down by a decline in outlays on single-family housing projects amid higher borrowing costs and a rising supply of unsold homes.】

item.title: 菲律宾双龙子公司 Hotel101 在纳斯达克上市取得进展
item.description: Hotel101 Global Holdings Corp 和在纳斯达克上市的特殊目的收购公司 JVSPAC Acquisition Corp 周一表示，他们已获得监管部门的批准，可以继续执行业务合并协议。【原文：Hotel101 Global Holdings Corp and Nasdaq-listed special purpose acquisition company JVSPAC Acquisition Corp said on Monday they had obtained a regulatory nod to proceed with a business combination agreement.】

item.title: 在股东和解协议中，谷歌将斥资 5 亿美元整顿合规性
item.description: 和解文件显示，谷歌同意在 10 年内斥资 5 亿美元对其合规结构进行彻底改革，以解决股东指控该搜索引擎公司违反反垄断法的诉讼。【原文：Google agreed to spend $500 million over 10 years to overhaul its compliance structure, to settle shareholder litigation accusing the search engine company of antitrust violations, settlement papers show.】

item.title: 理财经理 Thrivent 开设数字银行，吸引年轻零售客户
item.description: 资金管理公司 Thrivent 周日开设了一家数字银行，旨在吸引年轻人。【原文：Money manager Thrivent opened a digital bank on Sunday, aiming to attract young people as part of a nationwide push, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国 5 月制造业依然低迷；交货时间延长
item.description: 5 月份，美国制造业连续第三个月萎缩，在关税的影响下，供应商需要更长的时间来交付投入品，这可能预示着一些商品即将出现短缺。【原文：U.S. manufacturing contracted for a third straight month in May and suppliers took longer to deliver inputs amid tariffs, potentially signaling looming shortages of some goods.】

item.title: 天文学家担心马斯克的 "星链 "计划会影响南非大型望远镜的观测工作
item.description: 一位资深科学家说，与南非 SKA 望远镜合作的天文学家正在推动有关部门确保与埃隆-马斯克的 Starlink 公司签订的任何许可协议都将保护他们的突破性观测。【原文：Astronomers working with South Africa's SKA telescope are pushing authorities to ensure that any licensing agreement with Elon Musk's Starlink will protect their groundbreaking observations, a senior scientist said.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回高山证券对美国金融业监管局的质疑
item.description: 美国最高法院周一拒绝审理经纪商阿尔派恩证券公司（Alpine Securities）提出的质疑，该公司声称联邦政府赋予华尔街自我监管机构--金融业监管局（Financial Industry Regulatory Authority）的执法权是违宪的。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined on Monday to hear a challenge by broker-dealer Alpine Securities claiming that the enforcement power given by the federal government to the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority, Wall Street's self-regulator, is unconstitutional.】

item.title: 应用数字公司与 CoreWeave 签订价值 70 亿美元的 15 年租约
item.description: 应用数字公司（Applied Digital）周一表示，它已与英伟达（Nvidia）支持的专业云服务提供商 CoreWeave 签订了两份为期 15 年的租约，租期内将为数据中心运营商带来约 70 亿美元的收入。【原文：Applied Digital said on Monday it has entered into two 15-year leases with CoreWeave , a specialized cloud services provider backed by Nvidia , which will generate about $7 billion in revenue for the data center operator over the lease period.】

item.title: 德国监管机构认为公司在业绩公布前与分析师的电话会议中没有滥用职权行为
item.description: 在媒体对公司可能泄露内幕信息表示担忧之后，德国金融监管机构的一项调查发现，没有理由改变公司在公布业绩之前与分析师沟通的做法。【原文：An investigation by Germany's financial watchdog has found no reason to change companies' practice of communicating with analysts before publishing results, following media concerns about the potential disclosure of insider information.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙告诉福克斯财经：美国债务可能引发债券动荡
item.description: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）周一在福克斯财经频道（Fox Business）的 "与玛丽亚共度的早晨"（Mornings with Maria）节目中表示，不断上升的美国国债将给债券市场带来 "艰难时刻"，最终可能导致利差扩大。【原文：JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon said on Monday that the rising U.S. national debt is going to create a "tough time" for the bond market and could eventually cause spreads to widen, he told Fox Business’ "Mornings with Maria" program.】

item.title: 穆迪称，2019 年至 2024 年美国寿险公司向海外转移 8000 亿美元
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）的最新报告显示，由于私人信贷的增长改变了美国寿险业，同时也带来了一些风险，美国寿险公司在 2019 年至 2024 年期间将近 8000 亿美元的准备金转移到了海外分支机构。【原文：U.S. life insurers moved nearly $800 billion in reserves to offshore affiliates between 2019 and 2024, as the growth of private credit has transformed the sector and presented several risks along with it, according to a new Moody's Ratings report.】

item.title: 量子公司 Infleqtion 融资 1 亿美元，与上汽集团合作进行国防销售
item.description: 量子计算公司 Infleqtion 周一表示，该公司已筹集到 1 亿美元的风险投资，并与政府服务承包商科学应用国际公司（Science Applications International Corp）合作，寻求国防交易。【原文：Quantum computing firm Infleqtion said on Monday it has raised $100 million in venture capital and paired with government services contractor Science Applications International Corp to pursue defense deals.】

item.title: 欧盟称本周将为美国削减关税提出有力理由
item.description: 欧盟委员会周一表示，即使在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示将把钢铁和铝的进口关税提高一倍至 50%之后，欧盟委员会也将在本周提出强有力的理由，要求美国降低或取消关税。【原文：The European Commission said on Monday it would make a strong case this week for the United States to reduce or eliminate tariffs even after Donald Trump said he would double import duties on steel and aluminium to 50%.】

item.title: 特朗普加倍征收关税后，美国买家的铝溢价飙升
item.description: 周一，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示计划将进口钢铁和铝的关税从 25% 提高到 50% 之后，消费者在美国实物市场上购买铝的溢价飙升。【原文：Premiums for consumers buying aluminium on the physical market in the United States soared on Monday after U.S. President Donald Trump said he planned to increase tariffs on imported steel and aluminium to 50% from 25%.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Meta 的目标是到 2026 年利用人工智能实现广告的完全自动化
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一援引知情人士的话报道，Meta Platforms 的目标是在明年年底之前，让品牌利用其人工智能工具全面创建和定位广告。【原文：Meta Platforms aims to allow brands to fully create and target advertisements with its artificial intelligence tools by the end of next year, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特斯拉在欧洲的销量持续下滑，但新款Model Y提高了挪威的交付量
item.description: 5 月份，特斯拉汽车在瑞典和葡萄牙等多个欧洲市场的销量大幅下滑，这是特斯拉连续第五个月销量下滑，其原因被归咎于首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的政治活动和过时的车型阵容。【原文：Tesla's car sales fell sharply in several European markets including Sweden and Portugal in May, a fifth consecutive monthly decline that has been blamed on CEO Elon Musk's political activities and an outdated model lineup.】

item.title: Circle 公司和股东计划在美国首次公开募股（IPO）中筹集 8.96 亿美元资金
item.description: 稳定币巨头 Circle Internet 及其部分现有股东周一表示，他们的目标是在美国首次公开募股中筹集多达 8.96 亿美元的资金。【原文：Circle Internet and some of its existing shareholders are aiming to raise as much as $896 million in an upsized initial public offering in the United States, the stablecoin giant said on Monday.】
